address-selection--page-description: We’ll send any important information about this claim to this address.
address-selection--label-text: have the same mailing address as you?
resubmission-docs-upload--page-title: Upload supporting documents for your claim
resubmission-id-number--page-desc: We’ll use the Program Document Identifier (PDI) or control number to identify the original claim that was submitted. These can be found on the letter you received from CHAMPVA requesting further action on your claim.
resubmission-id-number--select-label: Is this a PDI number or control number?
